name: D.va Dash - An Overwatch Fangame
description:
OPTIMISED FOR MOBILE DEVICES!

Left = Jump

Right = Shoot

This was a short 2 week long project I created in Construct 2 and the first time I tried my hand at custom pixel art sprites and animations. It was also the first Construct 2 game I've created.

This whole project was based on the ideas of being simple, time waster type game.

PC Controls:

Click = Shoot

Up = Jump
